Manicure Services
Be more beautiful and stylish with our manicure service. All of the staff are well-trained, careful and whole-hearted. Take the time from your busy schedule to help your hands and nails look their best.
Pedicure Services
Indulge your feet with our exclusive spa pedicures. Our pedicure chairs are noiseless and pipe less offering the best combination of relaxation & sanitation. We'll make you feel like royalty!
Massage Therapy
We customize every massage for the client based on your feedback at the beginning of your session. Often we incorporate various types of massage techniques into a single session.
Waxing Services
We understand that waxing is personal, so we're committed to making you comfortable, both through friendly, straightforward service and the very best waxing products available.
MORE INFO
ABOUT US
Luxury Nail & Spa is the premier destination for nail services in the heart of Gambrills, MD. Getting your nails done should be an indulgence and Luxury Nail & Spa understands this. Our goal is to pamper all the ladies of Gambrills, MD with unique manicures and pedicures with the highest quality service. Since our opening, we've become a perfect destination for those seeking peace and charm. To friends, we are a social gathering lounge to share weekly events and to others, we are where to come to be made beautiful for their best moments. Our innovative spa chairs and instruments are sterilized after every use to ensure your safety. Rest assured that you will be in good hands at Luxury Nail & Spa. From the minute you step into our salon to the minute you step out, you’ll be provided with excellent service and comfort in a relaxing environment.

Our philosophy is very simple: provide a comfortable and relaxing experience with quality service while keeping the price reasonable.
Please Note
+ We offer specialized services for:
+ Wedding parties, proms, birthdays and corpo-rate groups.
+ Please contact our manager for more informa-tion about what we can do to make your next event huge success.
